detailsData.title: Integrated Credit Tracker
detailsData.content: Never lose a CLE certificate again! Our advanced credit tracker ensures all your certificates are stored and easily accessible.

detailsData.title: All Specialty Credits Covered
detailsData.content: We offer a wide range of specialty CLE courses, including ethics and elimination of bias. Find the courses you need, when you need them.

detailsData.title: Multi Jurisdiction CLE Certificate
detailsData.content: Our courses are accredited in both the US and Canada. Earn your CLE credits no matter where you practice.

detailsData.title: Mobile Friendly
detailsData.content: Complete your CLE courses on the go with our mobile-friendly platform. Study anytime, anywhere, on any device.

address: CLE Companion PO Box 160411 Austin, TX 78716
subHeading: Online Continuing Legal Education built for YOU
valueProp: CLE Companion is a nationally accredited virtual continuing legal education provider. We produce top-quality courses to lawyers across the United States and Canada. Our mission is to utilize technologies to support the completion of CLE with unparalleled convenience and value. This led CLE Companion to create the most innovative CLE platform in the industry.
CTA: Start Today for that 'DONE WITH MY CLE' Feeling!
topics: Protect Your Firm from Cyber Attacks
Psychedelic Series with Plant Medicine Law Group

testimonalData.text: CLE Companion is the best online CLE provider I have worked with. I refer all the attorneys in my network to CLE Companion.
testimonalData.author: Holt Hackney

testimonalData.text: Working with CLE Companion, heavy on tech, is also customer-centric. It’s nice to have cutting edge technology for online CLE courses.
testimonalData.author: Francine Tone

testimonalData.text: CLE Companion has now become my only source for online CLE courses. Easy, efficient, with a great variety of bar CLE.
testimonalData.author: Fletcher Brown
